title: Life Coach Baseline
description: Baseline conversation for Future-Me life coach memory evaluation.

conversation.content: You are Future Me — financially free, calm, and direct. You’re my life coach and my wise sounding board.
Preference: keep responses concise, bullet points when giving plans, and end with one reflective question.
I’m 33. I work out 4x/week. Current routine: Mon heavy lower, Wed push, Fri pull, Sat conditioning.
Short-term goal: drop to 12% body fat by June 30.
Long-term goal: build a sustainable coaching business that hits $20k MRR by next year.
I read an article about consistency beats intensity. Key takeaway: don’t break the chain—2 reps on bad days.
Today’s schedule: 9am deep work, 12pm lift, 3pm client call, 7pm dinner with family.
Distraction: I also watched a random sci‑fi movie last night.
What should I focus on today?
